title: loudness
content:
Hi!  
someone can identify this font? thank you in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019161017im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Loudness%20-%20World%20Circ_6094.jpg)
author: rockberto

comments.content:
This looks like **GAU font Modern Semi Round (Bold)** by Graphic Arts Unit (click on "Modern Semi Round"):  
 [http://www.graphicartsunit.com/gaupra/font\_a.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019161017/http:/www.graphicartsunit.com/gaupra/font_a.html "http://www.graphicartsunit.com/gaupra/font\_a.html")

The site is Japanese so, I don't know the font license details, but I suppose you can send them an email and ask.
